result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Diamond K. Bufford

records.addlTxt:
2:03 PM Attorney Drew Lehman in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Diamond K. Bufford in court.  Attorney David E. Celebre in court for Diamond K. Bufford. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM656/22CM251. Victim rights compliance. Attorney Celebre advises the Court that these matters are not resolved and would be requesting they be set for trial. State requests that the Court chose which case should go to trial first. Case 22CM656 will be scheduled for trial first.
Jury status hearing scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury selection scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on September 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Attorney Celebre requested to move hearing to 2 pm as he had a previously scheduled matter in another branch at 1:30 pm. STC now set for 9/29/22 at 2 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Diamond K. Bufford
Current: 4412 N. 57th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53218 United States  (Effective: 08-17-2022)
Prior: 2700 Anthony Lane Apt 10, Racine, WI 53404 United States
Granted. The defendant shall be required to reimburse at the rate of $100 per month until the total sum is paid. The first payment shall be made on 10/01/22. Attorney David Celebre is appointed.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
09:11 AM  State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman. Defendant, Diamond K. Bufford, appeared.   Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM656/22CM251. DE was not eligible for SPD. DE is requesting an adjournment as she is still requesting an attorney. The State asks the Court to provide the DE with the advocate counsel paperwork. Court goes off the record to allow the DE to complete the advocate counsel application.

Back on the record at 9:20 AM. Appearances are the same. Defendant sworn in. Court finds that the defendant was rejected by the SPD Office. Court orders Attorney David Celebre appointed as advocate counsel; Deft to pay $150/month commencing 10/01/22. Court adjourns.  Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
DE's copy of judicial rotation letter returned by the USPS; Moved, Left no address

ADDRESS INFO for Diamond K. Bufford
Current: 2700 Anthony Lane Apt 10, Racine, WI 53404 United States  (Effective: 07-06-2022)
Prior: 3606 50th Street #1, Kenosha, WV 53144

Attorney Drew Lehman appeared for the Prosecution. Defendant, Diamond K. Bufford, appeared. Clerk: S.Shaw
MINUTES: Matter here on Final Pre-Trial. Deft request to have an Atty appointed. Deft was previously denied services from SPD. Deft states that she is currently unemployed. Deft is referred back to the SPD's office. Matter set over. 8/15/22 Jury Selection converted to an Atty Status Hearing.
from the court re: Judicial Rotation on 8/1/22 mailed to the DE
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *No Weapons.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: James B.

01:37 PM   Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chad Shamali.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Plea of Not Guilty entered. Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 09:20 am.  Jury selection scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 09:00 am. w/ 22CM251. $5000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). mi
and witness list filed by the State
